name: Bullet Time EX
description:
Bullet Time EX is an arcade bullet hell with a time slowing mechanic.

The Fifth Bullet Time Game I've made. This is a Turbowarp version, with better visuals and such. This is the original project: Bullet Time EX on Scratch (mit.edu)

How to Play: The cube follows your finger/cursor when pressed down. Tapping/Clicking around the cube will activate Bullet Time, slowing down time for a few moments. Powerups spawn throughout your run, and they... well... act like powerups. Have fun!

Please give feedback!

-Changelog-

1.1

- Added Music and SFX Volume Sliders

- Fixed a few bugs and glitches

- Bullet Time can now be triggered with Space

- Bonus Modes Nerfed (1 Bullet Per Spawn instead of being treated like Neo Mode)

- Added a few back buttons

- Added death screen + death screen music

- Bars appear above your character to show how much time the powerup will last/ how long time will remain slowed down

- Added Auto-Move Option (Character now constantly follows cursor)
